channel.title: Need help with my compiler
channel.description: Well its a problem with me trying to compile my server. Says didn't find JFK 1.6 and i've downloaded shit but it won't work. If someone could please link me to the download for that I would appreciate it!

item.title: Need help with my compiler
item.dc:creator: @Robban Robban
item.description:
@Robban wrote:

delete averything in ur compiler and type in this: @echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with my compiler
item.dc:creator: @Cyph Cyph
item.description:
@Cyph wrote:

go to C:/Program Files/Java, What version JDK do you have their? Ok now Right click, Click Edit, and write your correct version in the compiler.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with my compiler
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Maybe its not your compiler…ever thought of that? maybe its you, I would think its you because you think something is called jfk? whats that suppose to mean “java fuckup kit”?

My point is that you need to go to the tutorial section and look at one of the million tutorials on how to make a server.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with my compiler
item.dc:creator: @mr_bob_silab2 mr bob silab2
item.description:
@mr_bob_silab2 wrote:

Are you sure you have downloaded JDK?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with my compiler
item.dc:creator: @Imnotokkk Imnotokkk
item.description:
@Imnotokkk wrote:

[quote=“mr bob silab2, post:4, topic:235775”][quote author=Imnotokkk link=topic=310998.msg2480991#msg2480991 date=1223525383]

Right click your compiler, select edit. Hold down ctrl + a then backspace. Now copy the code below, then paste into the file, save, and re try.

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit
and that is the only compiler you will ever need
[/quote]what about JFK?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 08, 2008, 10:12:38 pm[/size][hr]uhm that didn’t work at all =(

Actually, idds u drop’s post was accurate, and it’s JDK, not JFK. Follow his instructions and it should work, your current compiler is out of date, and you said you downloaded JDK, so, do as he said and it should work.[/quote]But it didn’t work =(

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with my compiler
item.dc:creator: @mr_bob_silab2 mr bob silab2
item.description:
@mr_bob_silab2 wrote:

[quote=“Imnotokkk, post:3, topic:235775”][quote author=i dds u drop link=topic=310998.msg2480989#msg2480989 date=1223525335]
Right click your compiler, select edit. Hold down ctrl + a then backspace. Now copy the code below, then paste into the file, save, and re try.

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit
and that is the only compiler you will ever need
[/quote]what about JFK?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 08, 2008, 10:12:38 pm[/size][hr]uhm that didn’t work at all =([/quote]
Actually, idds u drop’s post was accurate, and it’s JDK, not JFK. Follow his instructions and it should work, your current compiler is out of date, and you said you downloaded JDK, so, do as he said and it should work.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with my compiler

item.description:
@i_dds_u_drop wrote:

Right click your compiler, select edit. Hold down ctrl + a then backspace. Now copy the code below, then paste into the file, save, and re try.

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit
and that is the only compiler you will ever need
